page.title: 17WORKING FOR THE COMMUNITY
page.content: The buildings which figure largely in the lives of people of Dalmilling and Whitletts are{the church, local {schools and the community centre.}All of these help to bring together people who,in their own special ways,provide starting points,which lead to helping {the elderly,}playing an active role in {play groups}for young children or even giving time or skill to give children of school age and teenagers the chance to develop skills and pleasure gained from taking part in{games}and in{sport {related activities. Some of the club groups are funded by grants from{Strathclyde Regional {Council}or from the{Sports Council. This money helps to provide the pieces of apparatus and equipment which are necessary for particular activities.
